body: You've spent your entire life thumbing your nose at the establishment and take pride in your run-ins with the law. Somehow, despite all the mischievous behavior in your life, you've never been caught. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Escape Artist checks and a +1 trait bonus on Initiative checks.
name: Rapscallion
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Race Traits/Gnome Race Traits/Rapscallion
